properties.name: application.security.jwt-secret-key
properties.description: This is the JWT Secret key used in the application..

properties.name: application.security.jwt-expiration-time
properties.description: This is the expiration time for JWT in the application.

properties.name: application.security.otp-token-length
properties.description: This is the length of the OTP Token which will be generated in the application.

properties.name: application.security.otp-expiration-time
properties.description: This is the expiration time for generated OTP Token.

properties.name: application.security.otp-trials
properties.description: This is the maximum time for otp request in a row.

properties.name: application.security.otp-token-characters
properties.description: These are characters which will be included in the OTP being generated in the application.

properties.name: application.security.refresh-token-length
properties.description: This is the length of the Refresh Token which will attached to each session, generated in the application.

properties.name: application.security.refresh-token-characters
properties.description: These are characters which will be included in the Refresh token being generated in the application.
